statements: DELETE FROM LivestockHealth WHERE tag_id = 101 AND health_status = 'Good';
DELETE FROM LivestockHealth WHERE temperature < 39.5 OR heart_rate > 100;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 AND weight < 100
DELETE FROM RFIDTags WHERE location = 'Barn' AND last_scan_timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM LivestockHealthData WHERE livestock_id = 201 AND sensor_id = 301;
DELETE FROM LivestockHealthData WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND health_status = 'unhealthy';
